name.pehl.piriti.converter.client
Interface Converter<T>

Type Parameters:
T - The target type for this converter.
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractConverter, BooleanConverter, ByteConverter, CharacterConverter, DateConverter, DoubleConverter, FloatConverter, IntegerConverter, LongConverter, NoopConverter, ObjectConverter, ShortConverter, SqlDateConverter, TimeConverter, TimestampConverter
public interface Converter<T>

Simple converter to convert strings into the specified type T and vice versa.

Version:
$LastChangedRevision: 7 $
Author:
$LastChangedBy: harald.pehl $

Method Summary
 T convert(String value, String format)
          Converts the specified value to the type T.
 String serialize(T value, String format)
          Serializes the specified value to a string.
 

Method Detail

convert

T convert(String value,
          String format)
Converts the specified value to the type T.

Parameters:
value - The string to be converted. May be null.
format - An optional format of the value (eg for dates). Should be null if no format is supported
Returns:
The converted type or null if a conversion is not possible

serialize

String serialize(T value,
                 String format)
Serializes the specified value to a string.

Parameters:
value - The value to serialize. May be null.
format - An optional format of the value (eg for dates). Should be null if no format is supported
Returns:
The serialized string or null if no value was given.
